mapper.insert: insert into bookmanage( bookName, author, inventory, price )values( #{bookName}, #{author}, #{inventory}, #{price} )
mapper.select:
select * from bookmanage
bookName like concat('%',#{bookName},'%') and author like concat('%',#{author},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_sub( uId, bId, subDateTime, returnDateTime, bookType, returnType )values( #{uId}, #{bId}, #{subDateTime}, #{returnDateTime}, #{bookType}, #{returnType} )
mapper.select:
select * from t_user_sub
uId like concat('%',#{uId},'%') and bId like concat('%',#{bId},'%') and subDateTime like concat('%',#{subDateTime},'%') and returnDateTime like concat('%',#{returnDateTime},'%') and bookType=#{bookType} and returnType=#{returnType}
mapper.update: update bookmanage set inventory=#{inventory} where bId=#{bId}
